rooms.title: Night Garden
rooms.description: Bioluminescent vines twine overhead and sway in time with unseen crickets. Footsteps hush on mossy paths that glow brighter beneath kind intentions. Perfumed mists drift between sculpted hedges, each whispering directions in floral scents toward the districts beyond.

items.name: Luminous Petal
items.description: It sheds soft light, brightening when held near hidden paths.

items.name: Vial of Dew
items.description: The droplets chime like tiny bells whenever danger nears.

items.name: Fragrance Compass
items.description: A ceramic bloom that turns toward whichever scent currently guides the garden's guardians.

npcs.name: Garden Docent Syra
npcs.auto_greet: Follow the scent of moon-mint if you wish to dream true tonight.

rooms.title: Chorus Arbor
rooms.description: Branching trellises weave together into a vaulted chamber alive with the harmonized buzz of pollinators. Each vine bears clay chimes tuned to bird calls, creating a symphony that shepherds the nocturnal blooms open.

items.name: Harmony Leaf
items.description: Pressing the leaf to your ear lets you hear the chorus guiding migrating birds overhead.

npcs.name: Choirmistress Lalei
npcs.auto_greet: Join the refrain and the arbor will braid a path where you need it most.

rooms.title: Pollinator Sanctum
rooms.description: Glass hives suspended in the air revolve slowly, each home to luminous bees that sketch sigils in pollen. Nectar pools shimmer in recessed basins, projecting memories of every garden tended this season.

items.name: Pollen Censer
items.description: A delicate censer that releases a calming haze encouraging even the shyest flora to bloom.

npcs.name: Keeper Daxil
npcs.auto_greet: Mind the bees—they are writing tomorrow's harvest in the air.

rooms.title: Shifting Orchidarium
rooms.description: Panels of translucent clay slide silently to rearrange terraces of orchids, ensuring each blossom shares precisely the right light. Dew-beads drift between petals, carrying whispered gossip from distant corners of the garden.

items.name: Bloom Tuning Fork
items.description: Strike the fork and an orchid reshapes itself into the bloom pictured in your mind.

rooms.title: Singing Glasshouse
rooms.description: Condensation beads chime against crystal panes, watering rows of obedient aurora-flowers. Heat and chill spiral through carefully tuned vents, coaxing seedlings to glow in hues matched to the constellations above.

items.name: Glimmer Shears
items.description: Their blades part light without harming petals, perfect for shaping luminous blooms.

npcs.name: Glasswright Fen
npcs.auto_greet: Mind the panes—each one remembers the constellation that birthed it.

rooms.title: Rain Maker's Platform
rooms.description: A lattice of drums summons gentle rainclouds that politely take turns watering the beds below. Weather scripts carved into the railings respond to touch, altering humidity with a flourish of fingers.

items.name: Weather Mallet
items.description: Each strike calls a different style of rainfall, from tinkling drizzle to thundering downpour.

rooms.title: Dewfall Veranda
rooms.description: A suspended veranda catches the constant dew, letting it drip in precise rhythms into clay troughs of herbs. Bioluminescent ivy trails overhead, pulsing brighter when newcomers arrive.

items.name: Herbal Ledger
items.description: The ledger lists which herbs bloom each hour and rearranges itself to suit the reader's needs.

rooms.title: Glimmer Field
rooms.description: Fireflies orbit waist-high topiaries, forming temporary constellations that guide travelers toward the marsh. The ground is springy and echo-free, perfect for private conversations carried on the breeze.

items.name: Firefly Lantern
items.description: Unstopper the lantern to release friendly fireflies that map a safe perimeter before returning.

rooms.title: Tideward Lookout
rooms.description: An open bluff overlooks the bioluminescent coast. Clay telescopes track wave heights, chiming when the tide brings news from distant harbors.

items.name: Tideglass
items.description: A palm-sized globe that traps a momentary image of the shoreline to share with inland friends.

rooms.title: Mistway
rooms.description: Cool fog drifts from stone arch to stone arch, carving ephemeral doorways toward the coast. Every few breaths the mist parts to reveal glimpses of other travelers walking parallel paths.

items.name: Mistcall Bell
items.description: Ringing the bell clears the fog long enough to reveal hidden markers etched into the arches.

rooms.title: Serpent Bridge
rooms.description: A sinuous bridge of woven reeds sways above glowing wetlands alive with distant song. Ceramic scales along the railing warm to the touch, remembering every crossing.

items.name: Scale Token
items.description: This charm stores the rhythm of your footsteps so the bridge will recognize you on return trips.

npcs.name: Bridge Warden Nira
npcs.auto_greet: Walk in pace with the music or the reeds will play pranks with the wind.

rooms.title: Reef Gate
rooms.description: Coral-shaped pillars open like petals toward the sea. Waterlogged runes shimmer along the floor, recording the tides' gossip as they ebb and flow.

items.name: Saltscroll
items.description: A roll of kelp parchment that writes down the names of ships glimpsed offshore.

rooms.title: Moonpool Court
rooms.description: Silver water mirrors twin moons that wink whenever a wish sounds sincere enough. Bioluminescent lilies drift across the surface, spelling out predictions in ripples.

items.name: Lunar Pebble
items.description: Tossing the pebble into water reveals a brief vision of the next traveler to arrive.

npcs.name: Oracle Eive
npcs.auto_greet: Wish clearly—the moon dislikes muddled hearts.

rooms.title: Kelp Grotto
rooms.description: Trailing fronds hang like curtains, hiding alcoves filled with pearlescent seeds. Gentle currents from unseen springs swirl around your ankles, guiding you deeper into the grotto.

items.name: Pearl Seed
items.description: Planting the seed in water grows a temporary stepping stone wherever you need it.

rooms.title: Tidal Library
rooms.description: Shelves float on chained buoys, rising and falling with the surf while waterproof books gossip. Shell librarians swim between stacks, ensuring every tide leaves the right reference at hand.

items.name: Waterproof Codex
items.description: The codex rewrites itself in bubbles that burst into whispered directions when read underwater.

npcs.name: Currentscribe Ola
npcs.auto_greet: Need a tide table or a lullaby? The shelves know both equally well.

rooms.title: Root Caves
rooms.description: Massive roots braid into tunnels lit by fireflies who take attendance of every visitor. The earth is soft and warm, humming with the pulse of the trees above.

items.name: Root Fiber Rope
items.description: Flexible yet strong, the rope lengthens on command to bridge gaps underground.

rooms.title: Sap Sanctum
rooms.description: Transparent resin flows through twisting channels in the walls, carrying tiny motes of light that narrate the life of every tree in the garden.

items.name: Resin Locket
items.description: Seal a memory inside and the locket will replay it in scent and color.

npcs.name: Sapsinger Truun
npcs.auto_greet: Hold still; the trees wish to hear your pulse alongside their own.

rooms.title: Hanging Bog
rooms.description: Platforms of peat sway gently above reflective pools. Mist orchids bloom upside down, releasing spores that glow brighter when lies are spoken nearby.

items.name: Truthspore Satchel
items.description: A satchel of spores that flares gently whenever deception lingers in the air.

rooms.title: Brine Orchard
rooms.description: Salt-tolerant fruit trees twist along the shoreline, their roots drinking from both sea and spring. Clay basins collect brine-sweet nectar to trade with the market's spice merchants.

items.name: Saltfruit
items.description: A pearlescent fruit whose juice enhances memories of sea journeys when shared.

rooms.title: Glowroot Labyrinth
rooms.description: Roots arch overhead, forming tunnels that rearrange themselves when sung to in the correct key. Bioluminescent fungi pave the twisting path, storing echoes of every conversation.

items.name: Glowcap Torch
items.description: A fungal lantern that remembers each fork you take and pulses brighter toward unexplored tunnels.

rooms.title: Spore Chamber
rooms.description: Humidity hangs heavy around spiraling racks of spores. Each cluster releases a different vision when inhaled, cataloged meticulously by caretakers who take pride in their precise labeling.

items.name: Vision Vial
items.description: A sealed vial containing spores that reveal memories of the city's founding when opened.

rooms.title: Catacomb Nursery
rooms.description: Clay cradles line alcoves, each nurturing a sapling soul to be replanted in the daylight above. Lullabies echo in the chamber, sung by caretakers whose voices weave protective wards.

items.name: Soul Seed
items.description: A carved seed that, when planted, promises to grow into a companion tree tuned to your heartbeat.

npcs.name: Caretaker Umber
npcs.auto_greet: Hush—the seedlings are dreaming their first steps.
